message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product. We're excited to discuss the details with you. We're willing to offer you the product for $750,000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $650,000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your persistence. After careful consideration, we're willing to meet you halfway. We're offering the product for $700,000. We believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $675,000 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We're willing to make another adjustment to meet you halfway. We're offering the product for $690,000. We believe this is a reasonable compromise considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. Based on my financial considerations, I would like to propose a price of $685,000 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We're willing to make one more adjustment to meet you halfway. We're offering the product for $695,000. We believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $692,500 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We're willing to make a final adjustment to meet you halfway. We're offering the product for $698,000. We believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence. Based on my financial situation, I would like to propose a price of $696,000 for the product.
